name: Sky Fury
description:
Are you ready for a fast-paced racing and dogfighting video game experience?

In Sky Fury, you pilot a plane or ship and must compete against other players in intense races and fierce aerial combat in the spirit of Mario Kart.

With its varied graphics, intuitive controls and captivating gameplay, you will feel the adrenaline of action and racing against time.

Main features:

- A total of 23 tracks, including 11 reversed versions and a track with random obstacles that bounce off the walls.
- Alternative paths.
- 11 increasingly difficult championships.
- 10 airplanes and ships.
- Dogfight system with 5 weapons (machine gun, missiles, mines, shield and repair).
- Reach high speeds with the booster button.
- 3 difficulty levels.
- 25 adrenaline-charged music.
- 3 gameplay modes: Championship, Arcade and Time Trial.
- Can be played with mouse and keyboard or gamepads.
- Solo and Versus modes with split-screen for two players.
